question.questionText: Under ideal driving conditions, unless traffic signs indicate otherwise, the speed limit in alleys should be
In urban or town roads under ideal driving conditions the speed limit is ______
A Neighborhood Electric Vehicle (NEV) can be driven
question.answerText: only on streets with speed limit 25 mph of less
only on streets with speed limit 35 mph or less
only on streets with speed limit 45 mph of less

question.questionText: Under ideal driving conditions, driving faster than the posted speed limit is
question.answerText: legal if your speed is within +10 mph over the posted speed limit
legal if the other traffic is driving faster than the posted speed limit
legal if there is no other vehicle in your lane ahead of your vehicle

question.questionText: This road sign means under ideal driving conditions:
When you are merging on to the freeway, you should be driving
question.answerText: at or near the same speed as the traffic on the freeway
5 or 10 miles slower than the traffic on the freeway
